edis.title: edis
edis.description: Dissociation energies data file now lives in the kimmdy root config as `config.edissoc`

itp.title: itp
itp.description: Additional itp file with bonded parameters is no longer required and directly read from the forcefield.

dt_distances.title: dt_distances
dt_distances.description: Stepsize in ps for reading distances from the plumed distances.dat file. 0 Means use every frame in the file.

b0_overwrite.title: b0_overwrite
b0_overwrite.description: Global equilibrium bond length used as an offset for calculating bond forces.

f0_overwrite.title: f0_overwrite
f0_overwrite.description: Global equilibrium bond force used as an offset for calculating bond forces.

recompute_bondstats.title: recompute_bondstats
recompute_bondstats.description: Recompute bondstats (mean distance and force) even if a .kimmdy.bondstats cache file is found.

check_bound.description: Check the topology for bonds between plumed atom pairs and only attempt to break them if they are actually bonded.

use_morse.description: Calculate transition rates using a morse potential (the default). If set to `false`, a harmonic potential is used instead.

arrhenius_equation.title: arrhenius_equation
arrhenius_equation.description: For setting values in the arrhenius equation
